nodes.text: Coronet-SFS-14 was a large gray factory belonging to the companies Santhe and Sienar Fleet Systems. It was located in Coronet City somewhere between Narro Sienar Boulevard and Coronet Spaceport on the planet Corellia. A row of four desalination tanks were constructed alongside the factory.

In the year 13 BBY, the criminals Han and Qi'ra raced past the factory in a stolen M-68 landspeeder while trying to escape Moloch of the White Worms gang, who also drove past the factory in his A-A4B truckspeeder.

Coronet-SFS-14 first appeared in the 2018 film Solo: A Star Wars Story and received identification in the accompanying reference book Solo: A Star Wars Story The Official Guide, which was written by Pablo Hidalgo. The Corellia speeder chase locations in Solo were filmed at Fawley Power Station or Tilbury in England.
